casebody.data:
No. 08-1438. Harvey Leroy Sossamon, III, Petitioner v. Texas, et al. 562 U.S. 821, 131 S. Ct. 378,

178 L. Ed. 2d 14,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6427. October 4, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed further herein in forma pauperis denied. Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
